full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Social and Support Services for Asylum Seekers
#### Contract Reference Number: WS3659876559-Doc3694124648

#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal

#### Procurement Category: SRV (Services)

#### Start of Tender Period: NULL

#### End of Tender Period: 2022-12-31

#### Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-10, 2:00 PM EST

#### Status: Expired

**Contract Description**
The Department of Citizenship and Immigration (IRCC), represented by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), is seeking proposals for Social and Support Services to support the arrival of Asylum Seekers in the Quebec region. The Services may include site management and coordination, basic medical and health services, sanitation services and logistics. The Contractor will be required to work with the Government of Canada to coordinate the intake and management of Asylum Seekers in temporary accommodation facilities.

**Location**
The services will be provided in the Quebec region, excluding the National Capital Region.

**Specifications**
The procurement is a competitive process, open to all qualified organizations. The selection criterion is the lowest price.

**Submission Procedures**
Proposals, including all required supporting documentation, must be submitted by November 10, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST. Late submissions will not be accepted, and the bid will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information**
For further information, contact GC ADMIN NG at [tpspsc.padaspszl-apspspdzl.pwgsc@tpsc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tpspsc.padaspszl-apspspdzl.pwgsc@tpsc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

The commas was corrected, proper markdown formatting just taken into consideration for italic styling. The Source and target languages remain the same.
